detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High paper bag waist with concealed elastication and a drawstring, a zip fly, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Fitted body in soft viscose jersey. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam at the top, a deep neckline at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset.
Shirt in cotton twill with a lined jersey hood and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with pleats at the front, a fake fly with a button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. (Sizes 0-1 have soft soles.)
Soft leather mules with fold-down heels and a concealed elastic gore in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in slub linen jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Hat in a rib-knit wool blend with a turned-up hem.

Shaping Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a mesh back section, high waist, lined gusset, wide sides, high-cut legs and half-string back. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the tummy and hips.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Straight-cut utility jacket in cotton twill with worn details, a stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud, and a zip down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Decorative trim at the back and on the pocket flaps. Unlined.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with asymmetric flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Socks in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif. Round neckline, long sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in a textured-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in patterned stretch cotton satin with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Fully lined, patterned tankini with a foil print. Flounce-trimmed top and bottoms.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, welt side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.
Calf-length satin skirt with a high waist, wrapover front and concealed zip at the back. Slits at both sides and at the back. Unlined.
Boots with an ankle-height shaft and lacing at the front. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 3 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with padded cups, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a mid waist with narrow straps, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin shawl lapels, a single button at the front, flap front pockets and a decorative chest pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved dresses in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and picot trims at the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen and a detachable lined hood with a narrow elasticated trim. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 50 cm, circumference 65 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Short, gently flared dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and long sleeves. Visible seam down the back. Unlined.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.

Knee-length, double-breasted trenchcoat in a stretch weave with a wide collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Shoulder tabs with a button, a detachable belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood lined with soft pile. Stand-up collar, side pockets and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and V-shaped opening. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in soft viscose jersey with an opening with ties at the top, a gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be adjusted at the sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Gathered seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Baseball jacket in cotton chambray with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and a pair of leggings in soft jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs.
Blouse in silk crêpe with a collar and detachable ties at the top and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, cuffs with two buttons, and a rounded hem.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a collar and chest pocket . Press-studs down the front and along one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, gently draping twill with a regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide, slightly shorter jumper in a textured cotton knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket regular fit trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a rubber print and plastic details. Ribbed top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered pattern. V-neck front and back, circular, flounced sleeves sewn into the neckline and a concealed zip in one side. Inset trim at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in soft cotton jersey with decorative metal eyelets around the neckline and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
